response.overview: Suddenly time-warped into the future, ninja Jiraiya murders the yakuza loan shark Masa and his crew. At the same moment, Sasuke, Kirigakure, and Jiraiya's arch-enemy Orochi are dispatched to eliminate Jiraiya.In August 2014, Osaka becomes the stage for a fierce battle between the yakuza and the future ninjas.The reason they came to 2014 was hidden in Jiraiya's past. And Orochi had completed his ultimate weapon to kill Jiraiya.
response.title: 空脱獄NINJA ジライヤ
